channel.title: Small Client error
channel.description:
Hey,
When i try to run the combopkerz client, this is what my RUN.BAT looks like:
TITLE Client @echo off cls
java -Xmx800M EGUI
pause
and this is the error i get: [img]http://lulzimg.com/i13/cefced.png[/img]
How can i fix?
Thanks

item.title: Small Client error
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

What if I posted this on February the 18th so you should let the fucking topic die.

Read full topic

item.title: Small Client error
item.dc:creator: @dkd108 dkd108
item.description:
@dkd108 wrote:

Mendorphins:

Also, delete the “cls” because that closes it.

no it doesn’t, it clears all previous text in your command window. but if you had none from which you started that batch file it wouldnt matter.

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:2, topic:382991”]Try “GUI”.

If not, I’m guessing because “EGUI” is not your main class. Have a look through your Java files to see which one has the Main string in it and then change the EGUI to that.

Actually, try Main or main first (case sensitive), if not look.[/quote]

what if EGUI has the main but it still doesn’t work?!

Read full topic

item.title: Small Client error
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Try “GUI”.

If not, I’m guessing because “EGUI” is not your main class. Have a look through your Java files to see which one has the Main string in it and then change the EGUI to that.

Actually, try Main or main first (case sensitive), if not look.

Also, delete the “cls” because that closes it.

Read full topic
